page.title: 08Education In Our Locality
page.content: The schools in our area that we are covering are nursery,primary, comprehensive and further education schools.We also cover centres for slow learners such as Maes_Gwyn and Park Lane Open Air School. Nursery education is found in Cwmdare and Comin.They take children from 5_11 years of age and teach them a variety of subjects. Comprehensive education is found in the Girls'Comprehensive,Boys' Comprehensive and St.John the Baptist. Children go to these schools from 11_18 years of age.It is in these schools that many children take their O and A levels to go onto further education. At the bottom of Cwmdare hill there is a college of Further education where students go from school to gain diplomas and certificates.
